vlive.korean: 즐길 준비 됐어요 여러분들? Are you ready to enjoy? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 23. 현재 1위 츄플에게 도전하는 경희대 래빈 & 용인 리퍼블릭!
여러분들 고민이 뭐예요? What are you worrying about? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 소통타임🐻
여러분들은 어떤 노래가 좋으세요? What song do you like? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 소통타임🐻
여러분들 빈어스에서 만나요! so I will see you then too. 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍀🍀
vlive.english: so I will see you then too.

vlive.korean: 그래서 여러분들 운동 열심히! So everyone, exercise hard! 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : 모두 굿나잇!!

examples.korean: You will be quizzed on chapter 6 tomorrow. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여러분들은 내일 6장에 대해 시험을 치를 거예요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You will be quizzed on chapter 6 tomorrow. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Discuss it among yourselves first. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여러분들끼리 우선 그것을 논의해 보세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Discuss it among yourselves first. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The rest, as they say, is history. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 이후의 이야기는 여러분들도 다 아시는 이야기입니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The rest, as they say, is history. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Drivers are advised to seek alternative routes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 운전자 여러분들께서는 다른 루트를 찾으시도록 조언 드립니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Drivers are advised to seek alternative routes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Remember those less fortunate than yourselves. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여러분들보다 운이 덜 좋은 사람들을 기억하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Remember those less fortunate than yourselves. Add to Wordbook
